actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

official_title: To require the Bureau of Labor Statistics to collect and report unemployment and related statistics by congressional districts.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to collection, collation, and reporting of labor statistics to direct the Bureau of Labor Statistics to collect and report unemployment and related statistics by congressional districts.

titles.title: To require the Bureau of Labor Statistics to collect and report unemployment and related statistics by congressional districts.
